biotools.summary: OmicLoupe is a software used for interactive exploration of omics-datasets. It provides an extensive set of visualizations designed to explore quality issues and biological and technical trends rapidly. It also provides visualizations aiming to make it easy to compare how gene products behave across multiple datasets.
